Uses of Package
org.sakaiproject.rights.api

  • Packages that use org.sakaiproject.rights.api 
    Package Description
    org.sakaiproject.rights.api  
    org.sakaiproject.rights.cover  
    org.sakaiproject.rights.impl  
  • Classes in org.sakaiproject.rights.api used by org.sakaiproject.rights.api 
    Class and Description
    Copyright 
    CreativeCommonsLicense
    Creative Commons Licenses are described by their characteristics, which come in three types: Permissions (rights granted by the license) Prohibitions (things prohibited by the license) Requirements (restrictions imposed by the license)
    CreativeCommonsLicense.Permission
    Permissions describe rights granted by the license.
    CreativeCommonsLicense.Prohibition
    Prohibitions describe things prohibited by the license: CommercialUse rights may be exercised for commercial purposes unless CommercialUse is prohibited
    CreativeCommonsLicense.Requirement
    Requirements describe restrictions imposed by the license: Notice copyright and license notices must be kept intact Attribution credit must be given to copyright holder and/or author ShareAlike derivative works must be licensed under the same terms as the original work SourceCode source code (the preferred form for making modifications) must be provided for all derivative works
    RightsAssignment 
    RightsPolicy 
    SiteRightsPolicy 
    UserRightsPolicy 
  • Classes in org.sakaiproject.rights.api used by org.sakaiproject.rights.cover 
    Class and Description
    RightsService 
  • Classes in org.sakaiproject.rights.api used by org.sakaiproject.rights.impl 
    Class and Description
    Copyright 
    CreativeCommonsLicense
    Creative Commons Licenses are described by their characteristics, which come in three types: Permissions (rights granted by the license) Prohibitions (things prohibited by the license) Requirements (restrictions imposed by the license)
    CreativeCommonsLicense.Permission
